summary: A Finish couple murders a young boy and his parents when they prevent the theft of their son's bicycle.
cast: Maria Heiskanen|Antti Reini|Berto Marklund|Antti Vierikko|Harri Mallenius|Marjut Dahlström|Eva Stellby|Matti Dahlberg|Christina Frambäck|Ingemar Böcker|Elisabeth Douglas|Jenny Enquist|Lars Fransson|Kalle Ropponen|Tomas Zolantin|Aimo Vehkaperä
title: Il capitano
